rows.label: qst620307_msg0001
rows.name: Thanks for that!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0002
rows.name: I think everything's ready now.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0003
rows.name:
There's no way this can fail. With
the aurora shining bright, and the 
Posystone ring to give her...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0004
rows.name:
Yeah, it's perfect. I guess all I
need now is to actually...do it.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0005
rows.name:
Okay! Then I better go get my
beautiful girl!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0006
rows.name:
You guys have been so helpful.
I'll never forget this.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0007
rows.name: Thank the God I've met you!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0008
rows.name: Yeah, yeah. Just go get her!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0101
rows.name: Hope it goes well for the guy!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0102
rows.name: Fingers crossed indeed.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0103
rows.name:
Even if proposal fail, at least Hana and
friends here. Can pick up pieces.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0104
rows.name: Come on now Hana, don't jinx it...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0105
rows.name:
Either way it's bound to be a sight.
Who's up for watching it happen?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0106
rows.name: Are you for real?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0107
rows.name:
Oh, like you're not even the tiniest bit
curious? Give me a break.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0108
rows.name: Okay, maybe I am... Just the tiniest bit!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0109
rows.name:
I'm not gonna lie, I'm a massive bit
curious, personally!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0110
rows.name:
If we all just stand there, he's bound to
lose his nerve though...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0111
rows.name: You've got a point...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0112
rows.name:
All right. Rex, we'll let you choose
who gets to stay and watch.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0113
rows.name: What's this now?!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0114
rows.name: I, uh, that's... (Divine Beast's foot...)

rows.label: qst620307_msg0115
rows.name: Who will get to watch?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0116
rows.name: Homura

rows.label: qst620307_msg0117
rows.name: Hikari

rows.label: qst620307_msg0118
rows.name: Someone else

rows.label: qst620307_msg0119
rows.name: Nia

rows.label: qst620307_msg0120
rows.name: Hana

rows.label: qst620307_msg0121
rows.name: Kagutsuchi

rows.label: qst620307_msg0122
rows.name: Saika

rows.label: qst620307_msg0123
rows.name: Meleph

rows.label: qst620307_msg0201
rows.name:
I'm so glad everything worked out
for those two.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0202
rows.name:
Yeah, and to think it's all thanks to
our hard work that they got their
happily ever after.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0203
rows.name: That makes us kinda awesome, eh?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0204
rows.name: I really think it does.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0205
rows.name:
Yet another thing Drivers and Blades
can achieve together.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0206
rows.name: We'll have to keep up the good work.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0207
rows.name: For sure!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0301
rows.name:
Aw, isn't that nice? Looks like he
brought it home after all. All on his
own, too.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0302
rows.name: Good on them!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0303
rows.name:
So how about you, Rex?
When are you gonna get around to it?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0304
rows.name: Get around to it? ...To what?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0305
rows.name: You know what I'm talking about!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0306
rows.name: I...really don't...?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0307
rows.name:
You know! Posystone rings and
auroras and all that!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0308
rows.name: Oh... That...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0309
rows.name: Uhm... Maybe in a little while...?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0310
rows.name: Or, maybe more like, a good long while...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0311
rows.name: Rex, you're hopeless...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0401
rows.name: Looks like it's all turned up roses.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0402
rows.name:
No kidding!
It feels like a load off my chest...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0403
rows.name:
Wasn't quite sure he'd pull it off
on his own, but he sealed the deal.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0404
rows.name: Good on him...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0405
rows.name:
Anyway, you and me, we're the
independent type. It's not like us to 
depend on others to do things for us.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0406
rows.name: You could say that again.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0407
rows.name:
I don't really see that changing
anytime soon...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0408
rows.name: No, I don't imagine it will...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0501
rows.name: I'm glad everything went well.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0502
rows.name:
Hana a little disappointed.
Was hoping for pieces to pick up...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0503
rows.name: Cut it out, Hana...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0504
rows.name: Rex, why ask Hana to watch?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0505
rows.name: Is maybe feeling envious of Masterpon?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0506
rows.name: Nononono, nothing like that!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0507
rows.name:
It was more like... You've not been alive
that long, right? So I thought you might
like to experience something like this.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0508
rows.name:
Ah... So Rex is concern after correct
development of Hana. Even Masterpon
sometimes neglect that. Thank you!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0509
rows.name: ...You're welcome, I guess.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0510
rows.name:
Rex... Hana must acknowledge
good deed of Rex. From today, please
accept title of Vice-Masterpon.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0511
rows.name: Vice-Masterpon?!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0512
rows.name:
No, ah, that's all right, really.
Let's just...keep things as they were,
Okay? I think that's better for everyone...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0513
rows.name: If Vi-... If Rex say so.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0601
rows.name:
How nice....
It went exactly as I expected.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0602
rows.name: You knew she'd say yes, Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0603
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0604
rows.name:
You saw how she was at the harbor,
didn't you?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0605
rows.name:
I may not have spoken with her myself,
but what I heard told me all I needed to
know.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0606
rows.name:
And while Leonidas is a little peculiar,
his love for her is true and pure.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0607
rows.name:
Anyone with eyes to see can tell a
couple like that is a sure thing.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0608
rows.name: Wow...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0609
rows.name:
If Meleph ever gets into a relationship,
she'll be safe as houses with you
around, Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0701
rows.name: Aww, I love a happy ending!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0702
rows.name: Yeah, I'm real happy it worked out!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0703
rows.name:
Hang on there, you shouldn't act like
it's all done and dusted now!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0704
rows.name: Huh? What do you mean?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0705
rows.name:
Well, you know! Being married is a lot
like the relationship between a Driver
and their Blade, right?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0706
rows.name:
From now on, Leonidas's gonna be left with
no defenses against Ondina! She'll have
him around her finger in no time flat!

rows.label: qst620307_msg0707
rows.name: I...didn't think of that.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0708
rows.name:
I guess I should be thankful I've ended
up with Homura and Hikari, huh? At least
they're both nice...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0709
rows.name:
Rex...
You might have the toughest lot of any
Driver on Alst, actually...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0801
rows.name: I'd call that a success, wouldn't you?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0802
rows.name:
Indeed.
A job well done.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0803
rows.name:
What did you think of the happy
couple, Meleph?

rows.label: qst620307_msg0804
rows.name:
Upon reflection, I see here two more
souls for whose sake we mustn't
falter. My resolve is strengthened.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0805
rows.name:
Hah, I should've know you'd say
something like that.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0806
rows.name:
I always try to remember that our daily
struggle is so that people like them may
yet have a future.

rows.label: qst620307_msg0807
rows.name: Be they Superbian or Invidian...

rows.label: qst620307_msg0808
rows.name:
You're right...
I won't forget that either.
